comment.author: 7337467@N04
comment._content: Thematic park about the History and the Portuguese Architecture, dedicated to the infants.  It situated in Coimbra, was inaugurated in 1940.  Author of the project:  Cassiano White.  Photographer:  Mário Novais.  It dates of output of the original photograph: after 1940.

comment.realname: Biblioteca de Arte / Art Library Fundação Calouste Gulbenkian
